articles.author: Tara Subramaniam, CNN
articles.title: Major night for Asian representation at the Oscars, with historic wins for 'Everything Everywhere All at Once' and 'RRR' - CNN
articles.description: The 95th Academy Awards were a major night for Asian representation on the silver screen with a series of milestones, including the first Asian woman to take a best actress gong and the first ever Oscar wins for Indian productions.
articles.content:
arts
